seo.title: Try It now
seo.description: Step by step instructions for installing the YakShaver browser extension and using it
seo.openGraphDescription: Step by step instructions for installing the YakShaver browser extension and using it

tryItNowCards.title: 1. Pin extension
tryItNowCards.description: Click the ![](/TryItNow/puzzle.svg) at the top right of your browser, then ![](/TryItNow/pin.svg) next to Screencastify.

tryItNowCards.title: 2. Enable devices
tryItNowCards.description: Click the button below to set up your recording devices.
